interface.description: Interface for application information in the device.

field.name: Application Version
field.description: Version of the application running in the device, in the format version.subversion[.release[.build]], where the release and build numbers are optional. Regular expression for validation: `^\d+[.]\d+([.]\d+([.]\d+)?)?$`

field.name: Application Name
field.description: Name of the application running in the device.

field.name: Copyright
field.description: Copyright statement concerning the application in the device.
